title: Ep. 852 The Democrats Are Reading This All Wrong
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the media's and the Democrats' continued attacks on Trump using “chaos,” and why these tactics are backfiring. I also address the Mueller probe and its failure to produce cooperating witnesses with evidence of “collusion.” Finally, I discuss the reasons that the Republican Party is losing in purple states like Arizona. 
 
News Picks:
Rick Scott lost votes in Florida because Broward County missed the deadline by two minutes.
 
Palm Beach County missed another deadline. 
 
An important piece about the revenge of the RINOs.
 
If there’s evidence of Russian “collusion,” then why hasn’t a witness produced it?
 
Is Democracy dying in a leftist soft coup?
 
Governor Cuomo’s shameless war on the NRA.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
